successes.title: Krossblade SkyProwler VTOL Transformer UAV
successes.description: Pro-grade transformer UAV for fast and efficient fixed wing cruise and vertical take-off and landing. Cargo delivery and drop. 4K Cam.

Pledges.description: 2 inch / 5 cm 3D printed static model of SkyProwler
4 inch / 10 cm 3D printed model of SkyProwler with manual switchblade transformation.

SkyProwler Transformer including: 32 bit flight controller (based on Pixhawk) + VTOL motors + thruster motors + speed controllers + aircraft tail & copter tail + 3 interchangeable basic nose cones + 1 slide on nose cone for external gimbal + removable wings + navigational lighting + retractable landing gear. SkyProwler is shipped almost fully assembled.
No camera, no video downlink, no on-screen display, no radio ground station, no radio receiver, no GPS module, no telemetry radio, no battery, no charger.

Suitable for intermediate to advanced pilots who want to use their own SBus or Spektrum compatible radio system and already have a suitable GPS module, charger and suitable battery. Batteries with XT60 connector fit in the supplied adapter.
